Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraMail
Namespace: "urn:zimbraMail"
RegisterDevice SOAP Command

Register a device

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required false

RegisterDeviceRequest

    <RegisterDeviceRequest> ## RegisterDeviceRequest
        <device [name="..."] /> ## NamedElement
    </RegisterDeviceRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <RegisterDeviceRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/device Required (only 1) Specify the device
/device@name Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
Name

RegisterDeviceResponse

    <RegisterDeviceResponse> ## RegisterDeviceResponse
        <device name="{name}" id="{id}" /> ## NameId
    </RegisterDeviceResponse>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <RegisterDeviceResponse> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/device Required (only 1) Information on the registered device
/device@name Required (only 1) Type:String
Name
/device@id Required (only 1) Type:String
ID
